thread.title: Pregnant Beyonce “Trapped in Miserable Marriage” to Jay Z – Report
thread.title_full: Pregnant Beyonce “Trapped in Miserable Marriage” to Jay Z – Report

author: Jessica Bennett
title: Pregnant Beyonce “Trapped in Miserable Marriage” to Jay Z – Report
text:
February 15, 2017 by Jessica Bennett 0 Shares Advertisement 
Beyoncé ’s killer performance and the general consensus that she should’ve won Album of the Year during Sunday’s Grammy Awards have been dominating headlines. 
Reportedly, there’s a more important story regarding the pregnant superstar ’s relationship with Jay Z , as the singer is allegedly “miserable” in her marriage to the Brooklyn rapper. 

The Carters’ marriage has seemingly been on a bright path since she announced her pregnancy via Instagram, but sources claim the glowing mom has actually been unhappy for months. 
The pair reportedly wanted more children in an effort to strengthen the marriage, according to RadarOnline . 
Credit: Instagram 
“Bey and Jay have had a really tough time, and they’ve been banking on another baby to get things back on track.” 
Another source claims the couple was “literally signatures away from a divorce” before Beyonce conceived. 
Credit: Daniela Vesco 
Jay Z is reportedly unhappy in the marriage as well, feeling overwhelmed by his fatherly duties now that Bey requires almost all of his attention. 
He’s also in the middle of a paternity suit brought to him by 23-year-old Rymir Satterthwaite who claims to be his biological son. 
Credit: Getty 
“Beyoncé and Jay are two flawed people who make everyone believe they’re perfect,” the insider added. 
They continued, “But they are a bad storm and you’d best believe there aren’t any blue skies hovering over them.” 

Do you believe Jay and Bey’s marriage will last once the twins are born? Sound off below.
